channel.title: Clickingbuttons command problem
channel.description:
ok so i have added a clickable command to the quest tab
this is my code and i need to change it so donators which are status 1 get rocktails and non donators get sharks any ideals? [code=java] case 28170: c.sendMessage("you spawn some food."); c.getItems().addItem(15272, 28);[/code]

item.title: Clickingbuttons command problem
item.dc:creator: @ta1nt3d ta1nt3d
item.description:
@ta1nt3d wrote:

you where close it was:

case 28170: //quest tab food spawn if (c.memberStatus > 1) { c.sendMessage("you spawn some donator food."); c.getItems().addItem(15272, 28); } else if (c.memberStatus == 0) { c.sendMessage("you spawn some food."); c.getItems().addItem(385,28); } break;

thanks for giving me the basic ideal tho

Read full topic

case 28170:
            if (c.isDonator == 1) {

            } else if (c.isDonator == 0) {
           c.sendMessage("you spawn some food.");
           c.getItems().addItems(ID,#);

}
